items.sentence: Don\'t forget to mail this letter first thing in the morning.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t care whether you like it or not.
I can\'t reach the book on the top shelf that I want to read.
I can\'t remember exactly how old I was when I first met Tom.
I can\'t tell you how good it makes me feel to see you alive.
I checked twice to make certain we hadn\'t made any mistakes.
A lot of people living in our building don\'t like the owner.
Why don\'t you just call Tom and tell him you won\'t do that?
You won\'t mind staying here alone while I\'m away, will you?
I can\'t do that with you because I don\'t have enough money.
